phrase.item: I am leaving your house, there is no point in me staying here.
You feel yourself to be above everyone, but others are not that bad. [???]
My tears have dried out from crying. From crying, the cup holding my patience has broken.
My bones have burned and my soul is dry, there is nothing else left to burn.
I read you the fairy tale of all lovers past, and still I went beyond them.
Your heart is empty of love, there is nothing left to say to you.
I used to cry because of you and you laughed at me.
I will take your love out of my mind, there is no point in me crying.
